data.title: Current OTM tender notices of Chattogram Zilla, Chattogram division and the adjacent districts.
data.text:
Currently live OTM tender notices of Chattogram Zilla, Chattogram and the adjacent districts.

Chattogram is a district of Chattogram division. Chattogram was formarly known as Chittagong. It is termed as the commercial capital of Bangladesh. Chattogram sea port is the lifeline of Bangladesh economy. The neighbouring districts of Chattogram are Noakhali, Feni, Khagrachhari, Rangamati, Bandarban, Coxsbazar, .

Click here to see the live tender notices of the Chattogram district only.

View LTM tenders only. * View OSTETM tenders only. * View All the live tenders notices.

Zilla - Chattogram; Division - Chattogram; Method - OTM.

Live tenders on eGP platform (www.eprocure.gov.bd):
